thread.title: Can you tell which picture of a giant cock is actually Donald Trump?
thread.title_full: Can you tell which picture of a giant cock is actually Donald Trump?

author: Sam Speedy
title: Can you tell which picture of a giant cock is actually Donald Trump?
text:
Well, it's that time of day again. Time to take something good and pure in this world and make it irrevocably tied to something awful.
This very, very large chicken went viral after being, like, really freakishly gigantic.
Am I the only person wondering why this chicken is so damn big ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤” pic.twitter.com/ZIWmEL2h2w
â€” LifesBook_Ceo (@LifesBook_Ceo) March 19, 2017
SEE ALSO: An orange alligator exists and people are calling it 'Trumpigator'
You don't have to be afraid of birds to feel a pang of shock at seeing this massive cock. That being said, it is beloved.
And as all beloved things end up on the internet, it's now ruined:
I feel like this is super important pic.twitter.com/l7ZSHvnK4M
â€” Kalvin (@KalvinMacleod) March 20, 2017
Is it super important? Is it, @KalvinMacleod ? What did this beautiful, prehistoric-sized bird ever do to you?
@KalvinMacleod @syberbullies pic.twitter.com/YGYY1Dk1E2
â€” Noah sand (@NoahKantrowitz) March 21, 2017
People had to go and bring another big chicken into the mix:
@KalvinMacleod pic.twitter.com/WRxJ2sSgyN
â€” Tom Kloppek (@kloppek) March 21, 2017
Does Foghorn Leghorn deserve this? The answer: everyone deserves better than all of this.
It will take many new giant birds to recover.
